name: Restaurant Reservation System
description: Application built for restaurant employees which allows them to create, edit, seat, cancel and keep track of reservations during their shift.

name: Studiest: Make and study flashcards!
description: This application lets you create decks of flashcards for studying. Customize and create cards, then use them for studying for that upcoming exam! This was a project I worked on at Thinkful, I rebuilt the entire application front and back end from the ground up using JS, React and raw CSS.

name: GrubDash
description: Built the backend API/server for this application using RESTful architecture. Desgined routes to provide fast an accurate data to the user-end.
